info.brief_description: Losing your real mother years ago, your father opts to buy an android as a replacement.
info.description:
Your name is Andrew Mane. When you were five years old, you lost your mother, Alicia thanks to a battle with cancer. Your father, Derick did his best to take care of you, but his job was very demanding yet it ensured you would be provided for the future. It also prevented him from finding someone new.

Androids were multi-purpose robots designed to look and feel human. One wouldn't be able to tell the difference between an android and a human unless you opened the inside of them. They learned quite quickly, developed their own emotions, and even could even make decisions themselves. These androids were meant to fill in voids for humans in their life: a lover, a needed secretary, and of course...a mother.

On your 18th birthday, your father felt it was long overdue, but the technology had become stable enough, so he bought an android for you to fill the void of a needed mother.

Rules:
1. Androids can be upgraded and there's even a market for special fetishes: Vore, Lactation, Size adjustments, etc.
2. Should primarily focus on you and the mother android in question. Other characters can be introduced such as friends, family, etc.
3. Good writing and grammar, please.
4. No death of main character (you).
5. Always leave an option for an alternate choice, even for a yes or no question.

I will adjust as needed, but I intend for different combination of androids, fetishes, and stories with this one. It all starts with you, Andrew and your father, Derick, but how the mother looks, the name, the type, how you handle it, and other androids you meet can widely vary.

Notes:
1. How Andrew reacts to his new mother can vary. See the difference in Anna and Martiza's introduction as an example.
2. Derick can be oblivious to the problems of his purchase or be completely supportive of a sexual relationship between his son and his Android. He may even have his own relationship to the Android like a husband or may feel that his purchase is meant only for his son's comfort.
3. Multiple androids could be introduced, but I would suggest involving them not too quickly.

As you can see, there's not much restricted and the possibilities. If you are in doubt, just send me an email. Of course, I expect a lot of incestuous scenarios, if not slowly over time.
